name: SPACE CUBE (VAN-GAMES)
description:
SPACE CUBE 

Have fun sliding into another dimensions, but pay attention to the obstacles and collect as much points as you can!!!

HOW TO PLAY 

To play you have to use the right and left commands on the  keyboard to slide the obstacles and to collect points. 

PAY ATTENTION! As much as you collect more points the speed will increase!!! 

ENJOY!!!
